1270400.name: ALIVE Demo
1270400.description:
ALIVE is an escape room format indie game, which focuses on the story of Chris and professor William Johnson. Chris is a young man, in his 20’s. He has no money and no one by his side. He is all alone. He lives in a pretty small apartment. He works in a job he hates, with a very small paycheck. Chris tries out a game he saw in his popup ads in order to cover his $100k debt, so he won’t get kicked out of his apartment.

Professor William Johnson is a former psychologist who suffers from trauma. Now he is obsessed with showing the dark side of humanity's sin of greed. William then creates the game named "ALIVE" and offers a grand prize for the winner.​

Follow Chris in an unwanted adventure as he finds himself stuck in the game, "ALIVE". He will face many challenges, riddles, and emotional storms in his path to freedom. Only you can write down his fate.
1270400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
